examples.example: 虽然这首歌一开始觉得有点难听，但多听几遍后发现其实很有韵味。

translate.english: Although this song seemed a little unpleasant to listen to at the beginning, after listening to it several more times, it was found that it actually has a lot of charm.

examples.example: 他的歌声虽然不是特别好听，但也不难听，反而有着独特的魅力。

translate.english: His singing is not particularly pleasant to the ear, but it is not unpleasant either. Instead, it has a unique charm.

examples.example: 他唱歌确实不算特别出色，但也绝不难听，并且一直在努力进步着。

translate.english: He is indeed not particularly outstanding in singing, but it is by no means unpleasant to listen to, and he has been constantly striving for progress.
